001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import com.google.protobuf.Message;
004
005import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
006
007
008/**
009 * Extends the standard {@link ModelAdapter} interface with rich persistence features, including querying, indexing, and
010 * other stuff one would expect when interacting with a full database.
011 *
012 * @param <Key> Type of key used to uniquely address models.
013 * @param <Model> Message type which this database adapter is handling.
014 */
015public interface DatabaseAdapter<Key extends Message, Model extends Message, DataRecord>
016  extends ModelAdapter<Key, Model, DataRecord> {
017  /**
018   * Return the lower-level {@link DatabaseDriver} powering this adapter. The driver is responsible for communicating
019   * with the actual database or storage service, either via local stubs/emulators or a production API.
020   *
021   * @return Database driver instance currently in use by this model adapter.
022   */
023  @Nonnull DatabaseDriver<Key, Model, DataRecord> engine();
024
025  /** {@inheritDoc} */
026  @Override
027  default @Nonnull Key generateKey(@Nonnull Message instance) {
028    return engine().generateKey(instance);
029  }
030}
